other_tests.findings: Profound metabolic acidosis with blood lactate level of 17.1 mmol per liter (normal <2.1 mmol per liter); lactate:pyruvate ratio of 38 (normal 12 to 18)
Elevation of direct bilirubin observed from day 7, progressing to full liver failure by day 12
other_tests.changes_over_time: Progressed to full liver failure on day 12

other_tests.findings: Normal mitochondrial morphology and no ragged-red fibers identified

other_tests.procedure_name: Oxidative phosphorylation complex activity measurement in fibroblasts
other_tests.findings: Activities of complexes I, III, and IV were 40%, 69%, and 18% of the lowest control value, respectively

other_tests.procedure_name: Complex I and IV activity measurement in muscle
other_tests.findings: Complex I activity was 52% and complex IV activity was 54% of the lowest control value
Generalized atrophy and a small corpus callosum observed

other_tests.procedure_name: Analysis of mtDNA by Southern blotting
other_tests.findings: No rearrangements or reduction in mtDNA levels
Decreased overall mitochondrial translation to about 20% of controls; for specific complex IV subunits, expression reduced to ~15% of control
other_tests.changes_over_time: With overexpression of EFG1, overall mitochondrial translation improved to about 40% of controls and complex IV activity increased from 20% to 72%.
